markdown:
| icon           = poe2 ring_harmony icon.png
| description    = This modest wooden ring was crafted with great care and detail. The inner surface is engraved with a symbol of two mountains joined by a diamond pattern, with the words "our stars aligned" burned into the wood. 

The ring is tinged with a faint echo of lingering soul essence. Memories of affection and devotion swirl about it, and the wood practically vibrates with a giddy sense of anticipation. Someone who once held this ring was captivated by an unanswered question. When they got their answer, they were content to leave their cares behind, where they remain to this day.
| added_in       = poe2
| equipment_slot = Fingers
| item_type      = Ring
| item_category  = Accessory
| requirements   = 
| is_soulbound   = no
| is_unique      = yes <!-- Marked as unique to appear in the unique list under Rings (Deadfire) -->
| value          = 2100
| shop_value     = 10500
| range          = 
| level1_spells  = 
| level2_spells  = 
| level3_spells  = 
| level4_spells  = 
| level5_spells  =
| level6_spells  = 
| level7_spells  = 
| level8_spells  = 
| item_bonuses   = Commitment;Lover's Bond (enchantment){{!}}Lover's Bond
| enchantments   = 
| rel_quests     = 
| rel_items      = 
| rel_abilities  = 
| rel_talents    = 
| internalname   = Ring_U_Harmony
| location       = * Set before an altar to Hylea on an uncharted island (Overgrown Island).
* [Ruins of Amira's Roost](/ruinsOfAmirasRoost/): Hidden near the candles.
| guid           = 82bc2ccc-83b9-47e4-90e9-a2c3cfe5336a
}}
'''{{Pagename nd}}''' is a {{lc:Ring}} in {{poe2}}.

##  Description 

{{Description |{{#var:description}}}}

##  Acquisition 

{{#arraymap: {{#var:location}}|;|x|x|\n}}

##  Trivia 

* Although this ring should be a unique (there's only one way to acquire it, the ID has a 'U' designation, and it has fairly "unique" properties) it, it does not appear as a unique item in-game.

##  Behind the scenes 

* Added in patch 2.0.1.0034.<ref>[https://forums.obsidian.net/topic/105656-patch-notes-for-2100034/ ''Patch Notes for 2.1.0.0034'']</ref>
{{references}}
